rules.name: Bun Project Context
rules.description: Always include information about this being a Bun project in the context
rules.message: This is a Bun project. Bun is a fast JavaScript runtime, bundler, transpiler, and package manager. It's designed to be a drop-in replacement for Node.js with improved performance and additional features. When providing assistance, consider Bun-specific APIs, package management with 'bun install', and testing with 'bun test'.
